Pre-Game Insights: New York is looking to build upon its six-game win streak with a victory over Washington.
The Knicks are ninth in the Eastern Conference with 33.0 defensive rebounds per game led by Karl-Anthony Towns averaging 10.7.

The Wizards average 12.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.5 fewer makes per game than the Knicks allow (13.6). The Knicks average 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.3 fewer makes per game than the Wizards allow.
Top performers: Jordan Poole is averaging 21.3 points, five assists and 1.6 steals for the Wizards. Towns is averaging 24.3 points, 13.5 rebounds and 3.4 assists for the Knicks.
The Wizards have gone 4-15 against Eastern Conference teams. Washington has a 1-22 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
The Knicks are 15-7 in conference matchups.

Others: New York plays Washington on a six-game win streak.
The game is scheduled for Saturday, 7 p.m. EST.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Knicks -13; over/under is 228.5.
